3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\crud;

5 use Ubiquity\orm\DAO;
6 use Ubiquity\controllers\ControllerBase;
7 use Ubiquity\controllers\admin\interfaces\HasModelViewerInterface;

10 use Ubiquity\utils\http\UResponse;
11 use Ubiquity\controllers\rest\ResponseFormatter;

13 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
14 use Ajax\semantic\html\collections\HtmlMessage;
15 use Ajax\common\html\HtmlContentOnly;
16 use Ubiquity\controllers\semantic\InsertJqueryTrait;
17 
18 abstract class CRUDController extends ControllerBase , MessagesTrait,CRUDControllerUtilitiesTrait,InsertJqueryTrait implements HasModelViewerInterface {
19  protected $model;
20  protected $activePage;
21 
22  public function __construct() {
23  parent::__construct ();
24  DAO::$transformerOp='toView';
25  $this->insertJquerySemantic ();
26  }
27 
34  public function index() {
35  $objects = $this->getInstances ( $totalCount );
36  $modal = ($this->_getModelViewer ()->isModal ( $objects, $this->model )) ? "modal" : "no";
37  $dt = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getModelDataTable ( $objects, $this->model, $totalCount );
38  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "#btAddNew", $this->_getBaseRoute () . "/newModel/" . $modal, "#frm-add-update", [ "hasLoader" => "internal" ] );
39  $this->_getEvents ()->onDisplayElements ( $dt, $objects, false );
40  $this->crudLoadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewIndex (), [ "classname" => $this->model,"messages" => $this->jquery->semantic ()->matchHtmlComponents ( function ($compo) {
41  return $compo instanceof HtmlMessage;
42  } ) ] );
43  }
44 
45  public function updateMember($member, $callback = false) {
46  $instance = $_SESSION ["instance"] ?? null;
47  if (isset ( $instance )) {
48  $updated = CRUDHelper::update ( $instance, $_POST );
49  if ($updated) {
50  if ($callback === false) {
51  $dt = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getModelDataTable ( [ $instance ], $this->model, 1 );
52  $dt->compile ();
53  echo new HtmlContentOnly ( $dt->getFieldValue ( $member ) );
54  } else {
55  if (method_exists ( $this, $callback )) {
56  $this->$callback ( $member, $instance );
57  } else {
58  throw new \Exception ( "The method `" . $callback . "` does not exists in " . get_class () );
59  }
60  }
61  } else {
62  UResponse::setResponseCode ( 404 );
63  }
64  } else {
65  throw new \Exception ( '$_SESSION["instance"] is null' );
66  }
67  }
68 
72  public function refresh_() {
73  $model = $this->model;
74  if (isset ( $_POST ["s"] )) {
75  $instances = $this->search ( $model, $_POST ["s"] );
76  } else {
77  $page = URequest::post ( "p", 1 );
78  $instances = $this->getInstances ( $totalCount, $page );
79  }
80  if (! isset ( $totalCount )) {
81  $totalCount = DAO::count ( $model, $this->_getAdminData ()->_getInstancesFilter ( $model ) );
82  }
83  $recordsPerPage = $this->_getModelViewer ()->recordsPerPage ( $model, $totalCount );
84  $grpByFields = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getGroupByFields ();
85  if (isset ( $recordsPerPage )) {
86  if (! is_array ( $grpByFields )) {
87  UResponse::asJSON ();
88  $responseFormatter = new ResponseFormatter ();
89  print_r ( $responseFormatter->getJSONDatas ( $instances ) );
90  } else {
91  $this->_renderDataTableForRefresh ( $instances, $model, $totalCount );
92  }
93  } else {
94  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( '$("#search-query-content").html("' . $_POST ["s"] . '");$("#search-query").show();$("#table-details").html("");' );
95  $this->_renderDataTableForRefresh ( $instances, $model, $totalCount );
96  }
97  }
98 
105  public function edit($modal = "no", $ids = "") {
106  if (URequest::isAjax ()) {
107  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids, false );
108  $instance->_new = false;
109  $this->_edit ( $instance, $modal );
110  } else {
111  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('._edit[data-ajax={$ids}]').trigger('click');" );
112  $this->index ();
113  }
114  }
115 
121  public function newModel($modal = "no") {
122  if (URequest::isAjax ()) {
123  $model = $this->model;
124  $instance = new $model ();
125  $instance->_new = true;
126  $this->_edit ( $instance, $modal );
127  } else {
128  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('.ui.button._new').trigger('click');" );
129  $this->index ();
130  }
131  }
132 
133  public function editMember($member) {
134  $ids = URequest::post ( "id" );
135  $td = URequest::post ( "td" );
136  $part = URequest::post ( "part" );
137  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids, false, $member );
138  $_SESSION ["instance"] = $instance;
139  $instance->_new = false;
140  $form = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getMemberForm ( "frm-member-" . $member, $instance, $member, $td, $part );
141  $form->setLibraryId ( "_compo_" );
142  $this->jquery->renderView ( "@framework/main/component.html" );
143  }
144 
151  public function display($modal = "no", $ids = "") {
152  if (URequest::isAjax ()) {
153  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids );
154  $key = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $instance );
155  $this->jquery->execOn ( "click", "._close", '$("#table-details").html("");$("#dataTable").show();' );
156  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "._edit", $this->_getBaseRoute () . "/edit/" . $modal . "/" . $key, "#frm-add-update" );
157  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "._delete", $this->_getBaseRoute () . "/delete/" . $key, "#table-messages" );
158 
159  $this->_getModelViewer ()->getModelDataElement ( $instance, $this->model, $modal );
160  $this->jquery->renderView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewDisplay (), [ "classname" => $this->model,"instance" => $instance,"pk" => $key ] );
161  } else {
162  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('._display[data-ajax={$ids}]').trigger('click');" );
163  $this->index ();
164  }
165  }
166 
172  public function delete($ids) {
173  if (URequest::isAjax ()) {
174  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids );
175  $instanceString = $this->getInstanceToString ( $instance );
176  if (sizeof ( $_POST ) > 0) {
177  try {
178  if (DAO::remove ( $instance )) {
179  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Deletion of `<b>" . $instanceString . "</b>`", "Deletion", "info", "info circle", 4000 );
180  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onSuccessDeleteMessage ( $message, $instance );
181  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('._element[data-ajax={$ids}]').remove();", true );
182  } else {
183  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Can not delete `" . $instanceString . "`", "Deletion", "warning", "warning circle" );
184  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onErrorDeleteMessage ( $message, $instance );
185  }
186  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
187  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Exception : can not delete `" . $instanceString . "`", "Exception", "warning", "warning" );
188  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onErrorDeleteMessage ( $message, $instance );
189  }
190  $message = $this->_showSimpleMessage ( $message );
191  } else {
192  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Do you confirm the deletion of `<b>" . $instanceString . "</b>`?", "Remove confirmation", "error", "question circle" );
193  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onConfDeleteMessage ( $message, $instance );
194  $message = $this->_showConfMessage ( $message, $this->_getBaseRoute () . "/delete/{$ids}", "#table-messages", $ids );
195  }
196  echo $message;
197  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
198  } else {
199  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('._delete[data-ajax={$ids}]').trigger('click');" );
200  $this->index ();
201  }
202  }
203 
204  public function refreshTable($id = null) {
205  $compo = $this->_showModel ( $id );
206  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( '$("#table-details").html("");' );
207  $compo->setLibraryId ( "_compo_" );
208  $this->jquery->renderView ( "@framework/main/component.html" );
209  }
210 
216  public function update() {
217  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Modifications were successfully saved", "Updating" );
218  $instance = $_SESSION ["instance"] ?? null;
219  if (isset ( $instance )) {
220  $isNew = $instance->_new;
221  try {
222  $updated = CRUDHelper::update ( $instance, $_POST );
223  if ($updated) {
224  $message->setType ( "success" )->setIcon ( "check circle outline" );
225  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onSuccessUpdateMessage ( $message, $instance );
226  $this->refreshInstance ( $instance, $isNew );
227  } else {
228  $message->setMessage ( "An error has occurred. Can not save changes." )->setType ( "error" )->setIcon ( "warning circle" );
229  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onErrorUpdateMessage ( $message, $instance );
230  }
231  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
232  $instanceString = $this->getInstanceToString ( $instance );
233  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Exception : can not update `" . $instanceString . "`", "Exception", "warning", "warning" );
234  $message = $this->_getEvents ()->onErrorUpdateMessage ( $message, $instance );
235  }
236  echo $this->_showSimpleMessage ( $message, "updateMsg" );
237  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
238  return $instance;
239  } else {
240  throw new \Exception ( '$_SESSION["instance"] is null' );
241  }
242  }
243 
249  public function showDetail($ids) {
250  if (URequest::isAjax ()) {
251  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids );
252  $viewer = $this->_getModelViewer ();
253  $hasElements = false;
254  $model = $this->model;
255  $fkInstances = CRUDHelper::getFKIntances ( $instance, $model );
256  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
257  $grid = $semantic->htmlGrid ( "detail" );
258  if (sizeof ( $fkInstances ) > 0) {
259  $wide = intval ( 16 / sizeof ( $fkInstances ) );
260  if ($wide < 4)
261  $wide = 4;
262  foreach ( $fkInstances as $member => $fkInstanceArray ) {
263  $element = $viewer->getFkMemberElementDetails ( $member, $fkInstanceArray ["objectFK"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkClass"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkTable"] );
264  if (isset ( $element )) {
265  $grid->addCol ( $wide )->setContent ( $element );
266  $hasElements = true;
267  }
268  }
269  if ($hasElements) {
270  echo $grid;
271  $url = $this->_getFiles ()->getDetailClickURL ( $this->model );
272  if (UString::isNotNull ( $url )) {
273  $this->detailClick ( $url );
274  }
275  }
276  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
277  }
278  } else {
279  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('tr[data-ajax={$ids}]').trigger('click');" );
280  $this->index ();
281  }
282  }
283 
284  public function detailClick($url) {
285  $this->jquery->postOnClick ( ".showTable", $this->_getBaseRoute () . "/" . $url, "{}", "#divTable", [ "attr" => "data-ajax","ajaxTransition" => "random" ] );
286  }
287 }
